articles.title: Utah makes 1st purchase of COVID-19 vaccines, which may be distributed by mid-December - KSL.com
articles.description: Utah health officials have placed their first order of a COVID-19 vaccine to be distributed to hospitals later this month.
articles.content:
SALT LAKE CITY Utah health officials have placed their first order of a COVID-19 vaccine to be distributed to hospitals later this month.
